resources.string: Colgate 360 4 Zone manual toothbrush provides a 4 zone bacteria removing action. The advanced multi-action brsitle design (vs. an ordinary flat trim toothbrush) and the innovative cheek, tongue cleaner design together remove bacteria from teeth ,tongue ,cheeks, and gurms.
Please find the brush that is right for you.
